review_data.title: Excellent Fresh Food in Unpretentious Neighborhood Restaurant
review_data.content: Nice place to ear freshly prepared Syrian food and Pizza (a slightly eclectic combination). The Syrian food, especially the Mezze plates, is excellent and freshly prepared. The place is spacious and well decorated. The service is very personal and friendly.

review_data.title: Nice place, good food
review_data.content: They have their own dishes from syriah, like mezze, humus etc., but they also kept the pizza ofen from the former pizzeria, which is a cool mix. The food is fine, no matter what you eat. The staff is friendly and the terrace is nice,...More

review_data.title: Try the Buffet at weekends

review_data.title: Brunch, lunch, dinner... Syrian's best!
review_data.content: Eating in this cosy and quiet corner of Wipkingen regularly for either lunch or dinner: hummus, moutabbal, and the other meze are impeccably delicious, and so is the meat (Schisch Sujuq being the favourite ever). Recently tried the weekend (late) brunch (starting at 12), and...More

review_data.title: Wonderful experience
review_data.content: Great Mezze. Service is very friendly and the staff allways ready to make reasonable suggestions. We had Hummous, Baba Ganoush and other loveley salads and more. The chicken, similar to tandoori style - was very tender.
